name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Engineer with expertise in **Python**, **Java**, **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **React**, and **SQL** for full-stack development. Demonstrated ability in building scalable, secure, and reliable applications, leveraging **DevOps**, **MLOps**, and **Infrastructure as Code** strategies to enhance performance and efficiency. A track record of executing successful projects in healthcare, eCommerce, and finance, with a focus on AI, ML, and Data Engineering. Recognized for mentoring teams, fostering collaboration, and driving product thinking. Committed to writing clean, efficient code while actively seeking innovative solutions.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Python** and **Java** to design a microservices-based Clinical Patient Management System (CPMS), achieving **95%** accuracy in patient tracking and enhancing adherence rates through automated reminders.
Developed RESTful APIs using **Spring Boot** and **Spring Data JPA**, improving data accuracy by **40%** and ensuring secure EHR integration with **Spring Security** and **OAuth2**.
Enhanced UI/UX for the pathway builder utilizing **React** and **Ant Design**, achieving a **30%** reduction in completion time.
Implemented a notification system with **RabbitMQ**, achieving **99%** timely alert delivery.
Established CI/CD pipelines using **GitHub Actions** and **AWS CodePipeline**, resulting in an **80%** reduction in deployment times.
Containerized microservices with **Docker**, streamlining deployment processes across staging and production environments.
Managed services on **AWS EKS (Kubernetes)** using **Terraform**, maintaining **99.9%** uptime and optimizing load handling through **Redis** caching.

Utilized **Java** and **Node.js** to develop robust backend services, achieving a **25%** reduction in response times for ticketing and customer support.
Engineered a real-time notification system using **Kafka**, attaining a **98%** timely notification rate for critical issues to enhance user experience.
Designed and implemented a customer insights dashboard with **Vue.js** and **D3.js**, leading to a **20%** increase in resolution rates through data-driven decisions.
Implemented **Automated Testing** and deployment processes via **Jenkins** and **AWS CodePipeline**, ensuring a streamlined and consistent release process for all code changes.
Deployed the platform utilizing **AWS EC2**, managing containerization with **Docker** and infrastructure as code through **Terraform**, which resulted in a **50%** decrease in infrastructure setup time.

- Developed backend REST APIs using **Java (Spring Boot)**, achieving **98% uptime**.
- Implemented the frontend with **Angular**, enhancing load times by **40%**.
- Conducted comprehensive testing initiatives with **JUnit** and **Mockito**, resulting in a **30%** reduction in bugs.
- Optimized frontend performance through strategies like lazy loading and code splitting to improve response times.
- Deployed solutions globally utilizing **AWS CloudFront** and **S3** for improved low-latency access.
- Mentored junior developers, sharing knowledge on **DevOps** and best coding practices.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams to foster a culture of continuous feedback and improvement.

skills:

	Java, JavaScript, TypeScript, Go, Python, SQL, Ruby, Scala, R

	React, Vue.js, Angular, Pixi.js, Redux, Next.js, React Router, Material-UI, Ant Design, D3.js, Webpack, Babel, Jest

	RESTful API design, API Gateway

	Docker, Kubernetes (AWS EKS), Jenkins, GitHub Actions, Terraform, AWS CodePipeline, DevSecOps, MLOps

**Cloud & Infrastructure**
	AWS (EKS, RDS, CloudFront, S3), CloudWatch, ELK Stack

**Other**
	Microservices, CI/CD, Infrastructure as Code (IaC), RAG pipelines, Data Engineering, AI, ML, NLP, Automated Testing, Scalability, Security, Reliability, Performance, Mentoring, Coaching, Product Thinking, Curiosity, Collaboration, Feedback
